backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining story and user data models, access-controlled profile management, and CRUD-style functions for AppUser records.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend components, pages, hooks, context, and PWA files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and base layout styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up PWA meta tags, icons, manifest, and mounts the root React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest describing app metadata, theme colors, icons, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing install, activate, and fetch handlers with cache-first and network-first strategies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app layout handling splash, onboarding, routing, header/drawer integration, bottom nav, and PWA setup.
frontend/src/components/AdPlaceholder.ts: Simple component rendering placeholder UI for banner and inline ads while ignoring interstitial and rewarded types.
frontend/src/components/AppDrawer.tsx: Sliding drawer menu listing navigation items and handling route changes.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Top header with menu button and centered logo.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar with localized tabs and active state handling.
frontend/src/components/CategoryScroller: Scrollable horizontal list of categories filtered by mode with navigation links.
frontend/src/components/ContinueReadingC: Displays last-read story with cover, progress, and link to resume reading.
frontend/src/components/InstallPromptBan: PWA install banner with install and dismiss actions.
frontend/src/components/InterstitialAdMo: Modal showing an interstitial ad placeholder with a countdown before closing.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Dropdown selector for switching the app’s language.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button handling login/logout via Internet Identity with status feedback.
frontend/src/components/ModeToggle.tsx: Toggle for switching between adults and kids reading modes.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Manages a three‑step onboarding flow for selecting language, mode, and theme with transitions and completion handling.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/StepT: Provides animated step‑transition logic with direction‑aware and reduced‑motion variants.
Popover with controls for font size, background theme, and auto-scroll.
frontend/src/components/ReminderBanner.t: Temporary banner reminding users about new stories with dismiss option.
frontend/src/components/ShareSheetPlaceh: Share button using Web Share API or clipboard fallback and tracking shares.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Full-screen splash view with logo and random motivational quote.
frontend/src/components/StoryCard.tsx: Displays story preview card, with a featured variant and navigation to story.
Renders a banner prompting translation and shows a placeholder message after translating.
Defines a context for user preferences, syncing with backend or local storage and auto‑detecting initial settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppUser.ts: Manages unified user state for guests and authenticated users, syncing with backend or local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Handles favorite story management for authenticated users via backend and for guests via local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineDownloads.t: Manages offline story downloads using localStorage, including saving, removing, and retrieving stories with bigint handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects and subscribes to the user's prefers-reduced-motion setting via a media query.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Handles PWA install prompt events, dismissal logic, and exposes actions to trigger or hide the prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useReadingHistory.ts: Tracks reading history for guests or authenticated users, storing progress and last-read data with localStorage fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch stories, a single story, or the daily featured story from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, themes, fonts, and custom utility animations for the app.
frontend/src/lib/covers.ts: Returns a story cover image URL based on category and kid-friendliness.
frontend/src/lib/engagement.ts: Stores and updates engagement data such as streaks, badges, shares, and challenge progress in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/fonts.ts: Maps UI languages to corresponding CSS font classes.
frontend/src/lib/i18n.ts: Defines supported UI languages and translation strings for interface text.
frontend/src/lib/kidsMode.ts: Determines kid-safe categories and returns category lists filtered for kids mode.
frontend/src/lib/onboarding.ts: Tracks onboarding completion state using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/reminders.ts: Handles loading, saving, and checking reminder settings using localStorage, including 24‑hour reminder timing.
frontend/src/lib/storyLanguage.ts: Maps UI languages to backend languages and retrieves story content or checks translation availability.
frontend/src/lib/translatePlaceholder.ts: Generates placeholder translated story content by prepending markers to English text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesTab.tsx: Displays a grid of categories with translated labels and navigates to category details.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryDetail.tsx: Shows stories for a selected category with loading states and kids‑mode filtering.
frontend/src/pages/FavoritesTab.tsx: Lists favorited stories or shows an empty‑state message when none exist.
frontend/src/pages/GoPremium.tsx: Renders a placeholder premium purchase flow with plan options and feature list.
frontend/src/pages/HomeTab.tsx: Shows featured stories, categories, latest stories, and ads depending on premium status.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileTab.tsx: Displays user profile, engagement stats, badges, and settings information.
frontend/src/pages/SearchTab.tsx: Provides story search with text filtering and sorting by newest or popular.
frontend/src/pages/StoryReader.tsx: React page that loads a story, manages reading state (scroll progress, translation, autoscroll), and provides actions like favorites, downloads, and navigation.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers a service worker on page load and schedules periodic update checks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash-routing compatibility.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current architecture, issues, and feature requirements for adding a header and left-side drawer navigation.
